casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Melvin Lamar FIELDS 170A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 27, 2019 Richard Croutharmel, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Fields, Melvin Lamar Lisa Bradley, Assistant Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina Dear Ms. Bradley:

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 26th of August 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of August 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 16th day of October 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
